content: - make one right 29 sts remaining the needles left and right from the back to the p - purl front knit into the front leg of the strand this round 26 to 36 k to end can be a bit hard if so with your right needle pm - place marker at this point the sleeves should be 8 5 cm / 311/32 you can pull the leg a bit towards you as if you long from the underarm add more rounds if were going to purl it instead hold the loop in pw - purlwise they are shorter or up to the desired length the place with your left index finger and knit it r - round cuff will add 1 5 cm 19/32 rm - remove marker cuff round s - round s round 1 k2tog k8 2 2 3 times k2tog k7 9 3 26 sl - s lip the stitch as if to purl with the yarn 28 31 sts remaining at the front round 2 4 p to end sm - slip marker round 3 sl1 k to end the slipped st will give you st s - stitch es a jogless transition to garter st st st - stockinette stitch bobble pw ws - wrong side finishing yo - yarn over wash and block weave in all ends attach snaps at regular intervals to the inside of the edgings if desired sew decorative buttons on top of some or all the snaps © innershelter knitting 2017 www innershelter net/category/knitting
